name: Tamilnadu School Textbook 2020 : Padasalai
description: Tamilnadu School Textbook 2020 a.k.a Padasalai is an app that has all new latest Tamilnadu State Board School textbooks and Study Materials.  It includes all standards from 1st - 12th. Includes both Tamil medium and English Medium.  It also has Study Materials For standard 10 , 11 and 12.   This will also helpful to who all are need to prepare for competitive exams.
